aka: The Rise And Fall Of Hugh Hefner’s Playboy
this_title: Playboy: The Centrefolds that Changed the World
trans_title: The Rise And Fall Of Hugh Hefner’s Playboy
introduction: Hugh Hefner, founder of Playboy, became an icon of 20th century pop culture. This documentary explores how, since his death, a darker take on what really went on in Hefner's Playboy has emerged.
chinese_title: Playboy: The Centrefolds that Changed the World
